name: Independence Days Worldwide
content:
Description: data about various Independence Days or similar celebrations, in various countries worldwide

[Source](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/blob/master/data/2021/2021-07-06/readme.md/)

Columns:

* Country (string): Name of the country with an independence day (or similar)
* Day (numerical): what day of the month (next column) that day of recognition is held on
* Month (string): what month the day of recognition is held during
* Name of Holiday (string): name of that country's day of recognition of independence
* Year of event (numerical): what year the holiday was first recognized or celebrated
* Independence from (string): what other country or regime etc. the country celebrates independence from
* Event comments (string): more background info on that event / day of recognition
* Date mdy (date): m/d/y date format of the first formal recognition of the event
